mapper.sql: lid, uid, module, method, ip, otime, responseTime, result
mapper.insert: insert into log (lid, uid, module, method, ip, otime, responseTime, result) values (#{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

lid,

ip,
otime,
responseTime,
result,

update log
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
module = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
otime = #{otime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
responseTime = #{responsetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where lid = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
